caption:
This photograph depicts a clinical setting where an older man is being attended to by another man, possibly a medical professional. The elderly man is partially reclined on a hospital bed, wearing a light-colored jacket and trousers. He appears frail and is using an oxygen mask connected to tubing, which suggests he is receiving respiratory support.

The person attending to him is dressed in a dark suit and wears glasses. He appears focused and concerned, examining the oxygen mask equipment or possibly adjusting it to ensure it is functioning correctly.

The room has a clinical and somewhat dated appearance, highlighted by a plain, light gray-blue wall and a simple curtain that partitions the space, likely for privacy. Above the bed, a fluorescent light fixture provides illumination. The bed's metal railings and the breathing apparatus are also visible, contributing to the medical context of the setting.

Overall, the photograph captures a moment of medical care, emphasizing themes of aging, health management, and the role of caregivers in medical settings.
title: Doctor attends patient suffering from red lung, acquired in the iron mines.  (from the documerica-1 exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 49, 50, 51.)
